attributes.action: Issue a statement of concern regarding the violence against Christians in Orissa, India
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The orchestrated violence against innocent tribals in Orissa has gone on unabated for few weeks now. Several innocent people have been killed, churches and service institutions have been burnt, people have fled into the forest fearing for the lives. The law and order situation has broken down since the police seems to be indifferent to the plight of the hapless victims. A statement of concern is critical since there are so many Indians in UK quite concerned about the
alarming situation that does not seem to come under control

government_responses.details:
